Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI has helped my learning because I can ask it questions at any time and any type of question no matter how stupid it may seem. However with more complex ideas a teacher often explains it better although they are not always available.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: The feedback in GenAI is often from an objective and impartial perspective whereas with the teacher it could be more targeted towards the student.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: Sometimes the feedback can feel vague with both teachers and GenAI which creates confusion.
